sentences.en: a coil of copper wire
sentences.cn: 一卷铜丝

sentences.en: a coil of wire
sentences.cn: 一圈金属线

sentences.en: A shaft on the piston forms the armature of a coil.
sentences.cn: 活塞轴作线圈的衔铁.

sentences.en: A snake can coil itself up or coil around a branch.
sentences.cn: 蛇能将身子盘起来,或者盘在树枝上.

sentences.en: Boil the oil soiled by the coil in the toilet lest it spoil.
sentences.cn: 把被盥洗室里的线圈弄脏的油煮开，免得它变质。

sentences.en: Chilled water coil are controlled in much the same way as heating.
sentences.cn: 冷水盘管的控热和加热盘管的差不多相同.

sentences.en: Coil the fibre into a helix.
sentences.cn: 将纤维卷绕成螺旋形。

sentences.en: Dan played with the tangerine peel, letting it uncoil and then coil again.
sentences.cn: 丹摆弄着那片橘子皮，将它不停地展开来卷回去。

sentences.en: He coiled the rope.
sentences.cn: 他把绳子卷了起来。

sentences.en: He turned off the water and began to coil the hose.
sentences.cn: 他关掉水龙头，开始盘水管。

sentences.en: Her long hair was coiled up in a plait at the top of her head.
sentences.cn: 她的长发编成辫子盘在头顶。

sentences.en: Mist coiled around the tops of the hills.
sentences.cn: 薄雾盘绕着山巅。

sentences.en: Once we have the wire, we can coil it up into the shape of a spring.
sentences.cn: 一旦有了金属丝，我们就能把它卷成弹簧的形状。

sentences.en: Shake the rope and let the coils unwind.
sentences.cn: 抖动绳索把绳圈展开。

sentences.en: The bimetal strip is usually bent into a coil.
sentences.cn: 双金属片通常都卷成螺管形.

sentences.en: The burnt coil should be renewed.
sentences.cn: 烧穿的线圈应换新的.

sentences.en: the coil in a light bulb
sentences.cn: 灯丝

sentences.en: The heated gas is piped through a coil surrounded by water.
sentences.cn: 受热气体通过水中的盘管输送。

sentences.en: The snake coiled around the branches of the tree.
sentences.cn: 这条蛇盘在树枝上。

sentences.en: This is a double induction coil.
sentences.cn: 这是一对感应线圈.

sentences.en: Tod shook his head angrily and slung the coil of rope over his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 托德气愤地摇了摇头，然后把那卷绳子往肩上一搭。

sentences.en: When moving one coil near that magnet, the current has just produced.
sentences.cn: 靠近那磁铁转动一线圈时, 电流就产生了.

phrases.tran_cn: 卷材涂料；线圈涂膜；卷材连续涂覆
螺旋弹簧；圆簧；卷簧；盘簧
[计]加热线圈；[化]加热盘管；[医]加热蟠管
点火线圈；感应线圈；高压包

trans.tran_en: a continuous series of circular rings into which something such as wire or rope has been wound or twisted
to wind or twist into a series of rings, or to make something do this
to wind or twist into a series of rings, or to make something do this
